creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
(Noticed by Michael Wechner for Linux and myself for Windows.)

I got the latest Lenya snapshot and the latest 2.1 Cocoon snapshot and built
Lenya using built.bat on Windows.

When I start Lenya and log in as "lenya" I get these errors:

Default Publication
--------------------

Cannot get variable 'document-type' in expression
'cocoon:/lenyabody-view/{page-envelope:publication-id}/{page-envelope:area}/{pag
e-envelope:document-type}{page-envelope:document-url}'

...

cause: org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.uriparameterizer.URIParameterizerException:
org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.ConfigurationException: Could not load
class org.apache.forrest.components.sourcetype.SourceTypeAction for component
named 'sourcetype' at
file:/G:/lenya/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/default/parameter-doctype.xmap:29:1
36

Blog Publication
----------------
The prefix "i18n" for element "i18n:text" is not bound.

That might be a Cocoon problem.

Cocoon 2.1.6 currently is somewhat broken. "Could not get class" errors were
reported on dev@cocoon.apache.org.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
andreas@apache.org
text:
Actually, in xml-forrest-components.jar the class is named

org.apache.cocoon.acting.sourcetype.SourceTypeAction

What's going on? Where should the o.a.forrest.c.s.SourceTypeAction
be loaded from? Strange enough that it worked up to now ...
i changed it and it runs fine for me.
creator: gregor@apache.org
